pullrequest.title: [Blueprint] Add support for moving and rotating models

content.raw:
Rotate mode doesn't seem to be working for me. Nothing happens when I select the object.

At startup I'm seeing this error printed several times, not sure if it's related:

~~~
[GUI] [Err] [Ogre2MeshFactory.cc:429] Cannot load null mesh
[GUI] [Err] [Ogre2Visual.cc:59] Cannot attach geometry created by another render-engine
~~~
content.html:
Rotate mode doesn't seem to be working for me. Nothing happens when I select the object.

At startup I'm seeing this error printed several times, not sure if it's related:

[GUI] [Err] [Ogre2MeshFactory.cc:429] Cannot load null mesh
[GUI] [Err] [Ogre2Visual.cc:59] Cannot attach geometry created by another render-engine
